author: Faefrost
title: Easily my favorite of the Brain Attack figs
review:
Frost Beast. What can I say? He just looks cool. Almost everything about the fig just works well. No gimmicks, just some cool skulpting and details, and some color choices that really draw the eye and just pop. A great HF villain. The ultimate abominable snow monster or frost giant. Whatever you want.

Pros

  • The colors just reach out and grab your eyes. The white and trans medium blue are great. The small red accents just push it over the top.
  • Great face
  • The additional chest and shoulder details make the fig seem much more complete and alive than most Constraction figs

Cons

  • It suffers from the typical Hero Factor / Constraction fig open skeletal back
  • The giant left claw hand looks great from the front, but is just a hollow shell from behind.
  • The sword blade isn't the trans medium blue that it appears to be on the bag. Instead it is a softer translucent teal color. Not bad. Just not what was expected.

Overall if you are a fan of Constraction figs, this one is probably a must have.
